dataConnect.title: Connect all of your precious data
dataConnect.description: No more splitting data on Dropbox, Google Drive, or hard drives. Keep your data both updated and safe. Easily sync between devices and manage backups.

features.title: Multi-device
features.subtitle: access via phone, TV or VR

carousel.title: DHCP Leases
carousel.description: View and manage active DHCP leases on your network

carousel.title: Bandwidth Statistics
carousel.description: Monitor network bandwidth usage and trends

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some frequently asked questions we have answered quickly for you.

items.question: What is DarkFlows?
items.answer: DarkFlows is a powerful data integration and workflow automation platform that helps you connect and manage your data seamlessly.

items.question: Is DarkFlows free to use?
items.answer: DarkFlows offers both free and premium tiers. The free tier includes essential features, while premium plans offer advanced capabilities and increased usage limits.

items.question: How secure is my data with DarkFlows?
items.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we employ industry-standard security practices to protect your information.

items.question: Can I integrate DarkFlows with my existing tools?
items.answer: Yes! DarkFlows supports integration with many popular tools and platforms, and our API allows for custom integrations as well.
